document.full_text: washington should deploy ground attack aircraft against muammar gaddafi's forces and recognize the rebels, leading senator john mccain said, becoming highest-profile western politician to visit rebel-held libya.
document.title: mccain visits rebels, libya adjusts misrata tactics
